title: DAY 9 TS MODEL 1
description: Building a trading model with defined entry, stop loss, and target rules.
content:
In this lesson, you'll learn:

• Components of a trading model
• Defining precise entry rules
• Stop loss placement logic
• Profit target calculation
• Backtesting your model
• Testing consistency and edge

quiz.question: A trading model must define:
quiz.explanation: A complete model specifies entry conditions, stop loss levels, and profit target rules.

quiz.question: Backtesting measures:
quiz.explanation: Backtesting reveals whether your model has an edge based on historical data.

quiz.question: Risk per trade should be:
quiz.explanation: Risk per trade must be fixed at a percentage to maintain consistency.

quiz.question: A model fails when:
quiz.explanation: A model fails when rules are violated, not when a single loss occurs.

quiz.question: System consistency depends on:
quiz.explanation: Consistency requires discipline to follow the defined rules every single time.
